title: Camshaft Drive Chain Rubbing Blade - Removal

body.body: Camshaft Drive Chain Rubbing Blade - Removal
Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
The camshaft drive chain rubbing blade can only be removed after the cylinder head has been removed.
The camshaft drive chain tensioner blade can be removed without removing the cylinder head.
